== Eloor (CT) (627992) ==

Eloor (CT) is a town in the [[Paravur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 10.71 sq. km. and harbouring 7901 households with total population of 31468 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 240 km. Male population is 15557 and female population is 15911. Scheduled Caste population is 3433 and Scheduled Tribes population is 290. Census Location Code of the town is 627992<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 12 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 12 km. Railway station is at Aluva at a distance of 15 km.
